Our Service may change from time to time and/or we may stop (permanently or temporarily) providing the Service (or features within the Service), possibly without prior notice to you, except as otherwise provided in the Merchant Agreement. Our Service may, at some point, include advertisements, which may be targeted to the content or information on the Service, queries made through the Service, or from other information. The types and extent of advertising on the Service are also subject to change over time. In consideration for providing you the Service, you agree that we and our third party providers and partners may place advertising on our Service or in connection with the display of content or information on our Service. Certain features of our Service may be subject to additional terms or conditions, which will be posted with those features.

The “sPOS” name and logos and all related names, design marks and slogans are the trademarks or service marks of AsiaPay. Both parties agree that any dispute arising out of this Agreement, or any relationship between the parties, will be resolved only in the courts in Hong Kong, SAR, and in no other jurisdiction. Each party submits to personal jurisdiction in Hong Kong, SAR. You may not remove, alter or obscure any copyright, trademark, service mark or other proprietary rights notices incorporated in or accompanying the App or the Service, including in any Content. You acknowledge and agree that any feedback, comments or suggestions you may provide regarding the App or the Service (“Feedback”) will be the sole and exclusive property of AsiaPay and you hereby irrevocably assign to us all of your right, title and interest in and to all Feedback.
If you breach any of the terms of these Terms, we have the right to suspend or disable your access to or use of the App and/or Service.
Please contact us if you have any question about our Terms. \nGlobal Contact: http://asiapay.com/contactglobal_e.html \nEffective Date: September 1, 2013

ชื่อโฮสต์:

•	The Card Reader provided by AsiaPay shall be warranty by the device manufacturer at the specific time duration under the manufacturer’s policy. AsiaPay is not liable for performance issues or incompatibilities caused by customization of the Card Reader. 
•	Using sPOS Service requires you to have a compatible mobile device. AsiaPay will not warrant that the Card Reader will be compatible with your mobile device or third party carrier. The Card Reader modified contrary to the vendor’s software or hardware guidelines, including but not limited to those with disabled hardware or software controls—sometimes referred to as “jail broken”—are not compatible mobile devices. You acknowledge that using a modified Card Reader in our Services is expressly prohibited, constitutes a violation of these Terms. AsiaPay reserves its right to suspend your services and your sPOS Account. 
•	Your Card Reader may only be associated with approved sPOS Account. Your Card Reader cannot be passed or transferred to any person who does not hold an approved sPOS Account. 
•	If AsiaPay suspects, on reasonable grounds, that you have committed a breach of the Merchant Agreement signed with AsiaPay, a breach of these Terms or acted dishonestly or fraudulently against AsiaPay, AsiaPay reserves the right to suspend your sPOS Account. Should you wish to disable your sPOS Account, please feel free to contact AsiaPay. 
•	AsiaPay and the accredited Third Party provider reserve the right to vary specifications and design or use alternative materials as maybe deemed necessary or desirable at any time and any such change or variation being of a kind as not to reduce the quality, performance or appearance substantially.
sPOS Card Reader เป็นอุปกรณ์ที่ให้บริการโดย AsiaPay หรือผู้ให้บริการบุคคลที่สามที่ได้รับการรับรองให้แก่ร้านค้าที่ได้รับการรับรอง ("เครื่องอ่านการ์ด").

ก่อนหน้า

•	enable AsiaPay to improve and personalize the Services. Such as to customize, measure, and improve the content and layout of the service, including the display of customized, targeted marketing and promotional offers on the service 
•	monitor potentially prohibited or illegal activities, 
•	enable the User to access and use the Service, the Alerts and/or Newsletter 
•	send the User targeted marketing and promotional offers where the User has consented to the use of Information for these purposes; 
•	compare information for accuracy and verify it with third parties.
"AsiaPay collects personal information about our users during usage of the sPOS Services (the “Service”)."

AsiaPay may collect information when you use the service. However, all Information will be treated by AsiaPay with the utmost confidentiality as AsiaPay is the sole owner of the information voluntarily given to us by the users of service. We will not sell, share, or rent this information to others. 
Transaction Information. Upon using our service to make or accept payments, we collect personal information about such as name, email address, contact numbers et., and where the transaction occurred, description of the transactions, the payment amounts as well as the information about the devices and payment method upon completing the transactions. 
Device Information. We collect device specific information when you access our service which includes the hardware model, operating system and version and others. 
Use Information. We collect information about how you use our Services, including your access times, browser types and language, and Internet Protocol ("IP") addresses.
AsiaPay collects Information to provide the User with a secure, seamless and simple user experience and to comply with all legal regulations. AsiaPay may, in particular, use Information to:

If at any time you find any of your information held by AsiaPay is incorrect or in need of updating, please login your Account to change the information. Should you wish to deactivate your account you may also contact us at privary@paydollar.com, however after you have deactivated your account, we shall retain archived copies of information about you and your transactions for a period of time that is consistent with applicable law.
"You can choose to accept or decline cookies. Most browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline cookies if you prefer."
We use industry-standard efforts to safeguard the confidentiality of your personal identifiable information, However we are not liable for any unauthorised access to this information.
If you have any question about this privacy policy or treatment of your personal information, please write to us by email at info@asiapay.com.
"Please be aware that we may change this Privacy Policy in the future. The revised versions will be posted accordingly."
